questions.question_root: What is the name of our star?

students.name: John Doe
students.study_suggestion: Practice your addition facts and learn about the Sun's size, temperature, and importance to life on Earth to improve your understanding in both math and science.

students.name: Mary Smith
students.study_suggestion: To improve your understanding of the Sun's properties, try making flashcards with the property on one side and its description on the other, then quiz yourself regularly.
